item.title: FAQ
item.description: SkyCoin SkyWire Mining Platform Business SkyCoin What is SkyCoin? SkyCoin is the centerpiece of a large ecosystem; a currency for digital bandwidth, backed by the new internet. Fast transactions, no transaction fees & quantum resistance, SkyCoin is a third-generation cryptocurrency supporting a new free and open internet. SkyCoin's consensus algorithm, Obelisk, is designed to achieve true decentralization of blockchain consensus, replacing both Proof of Work (“PoW”) and Proof of Stake (“PoS”).
